title:
Electron-Electron Interactions, Magnetism, and Superconductivity:
  Lecture Notes for Introduction to Solid State Physics
abstract:
Lecture notes used as part of a graduate-level Introduction to Solid State
Physics course at Cornell University. I attempt to unify and update the
discussion of magnetism and superconductivity relative to standard textbook
treatments, and include connections to recent research. A few related homework
problems are attached at the end.
